author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Economic Offences Wing (EOW)-II, Guindy, Chennai, has said that people who have not received their deposit refund from Shri Ayyan Promotors India Private Limited in Cantonment Pallavaram, can file their claims with them.

An official note said that the firm’s promoter, P. Vaitheeswaran, was already taken into custody for defaulting depositors. He was released on bail later and so far 68 depositors had lodged their claims with the EOW for recovery of the amount deposited by them. In November 2015, a case under Sections 120 (B), 406 and 420 of Indian Penal Code and section 5 of Tamil Nadu Protection of Interest of Depositors Act, 1997, was registered based on complaints from depositors.

The claims can be filed with the Inspector of Police, EOW-II, SIDCO Old Corporate Building, Guindy, Chennai-600 032, the note added.
title: Depositors asked to approach EOW for claiming refunds
